oai_dc:dc.dc:title: EQUIVALENT POTENTIAL APPROACH TO LOW-ENERGY E-HE SCATTERING AND BOUND-STATES OF LI AND BE+
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATIL, SH
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: elastic-scattering
cross-sections
electrons

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We have deduced equivalent potentials from the condition that they lead to the same first order scattering amplitudes as those obtained from some simple density and density matrix functions. The predictions of this potential for phase shifts and differential cross sections for low energy e-He scattering, and bound state energies for Li, Be+, are in good agreement with other theoretical calculations and experimental values.
